name: Boxkiller
description:
How do you find your opponents when foes and bots look the same?

Boxkiller is a stealth strategy game where you play against your friends in a short multiplayer session. Your goal is to try to dash your opponents to the death and hide yourself in the crowd of the drones to avoid other players dashing you. But be aware that the drones have their own decision which could lead you to be detected by the other players. Only the last standing player will win the game!


Details

The game is fully played with your mouse. With the left mouse button you tell your character to move it to the mouse cursors position. With the right mouse button the character will dash in the direction where your mouse cursor points at.

In the game there are 4 Cities which some times call the nearby drones. This is one of the chance where you can detect other players or been detect by other players if one of you misses to go to the right city.

The game itself is a prototype. Let us know what you think about it and leave some comments.

Server Settings

  • Sync Cities
    • In this mode the cities will call the nearby drones at the same time.
  • Dashing bots kills
    • In this mode player will die instantly if they dash a drone
  • Bots:
    • Sets the number of drones in the game.

Hosting a game over internet

To host a game over the internet you need to set up port forwarding with following ports on your router: TCP 54555, UDP 54777
